title: New iboot PDU driver for Nova/Ironic

comments.content:
There is a new iboot PDU driver for Nova/Ironic.

This is a place holder so we don't forget to merge it to Ironic.

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/33869
Committed: http://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/8fa9e698e897a3cff2f163a62ec11077a1372b82

commit 8fa9e698e897a3cff2f163a62ec11077a1372b82
Author: Dan Prince <email address hidden>
Date:   Wed Jun 19 15:15:51 2013 -0400

    Add a custom iboot power driver for nova bm.
    
    Adds a custom power driver for nova baremetal so that
    iBoot capable devices can be used.
    
    In order to support multiple baremetal nodes attached to a single PDU
    you can specify a pm_address in the format of address:port,relay.
    If only an address is specified port and relay use defaults.
    
    Tested locally with an iBoot G2.
    
    Fixes bug 1226042
    Implements nova-barmetal-iboot-g2-driver
    
    Change-Id: I155f364f4ff6d77b34ded46de60c5cbca26596a2
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

commit 7f8fed748d7e35092353116ba839c3df6e6447ed
Author: Lucas Alvares Gomes <email address hidden>
Date:   Thu Oct 10 17:20:02 2013 +0100

    Port iBoot PDU driver from Nova
    
    Ports a custom power driver from Nova to Ironic so that iBoot capable
    devices can be used.
    
    Co-Authored-By: Dan Prince <email address hidden>
    Closes-Bug: #1226042
    Change-Id: Ibec34a7e0a69bb26d3e2a21b1f2d1a7ce3514347
